name: Santa Simulator
description:
There's a mysterious bell. You ring it.

Next minute, you're riding in a sleigh, dropping presents in chimneys. Welcome to Santa Simulator, part of Richie's Plank Experience or purchase it as a standalone game for the holidays.

Use the trigger on your controller to ring all the bells and throw presents into the chimneys.

How many presents can you deliver?
0 - 5 presents: Santa School Student
5 - 10 presents: Shopping Centre Santa
10 - 20 presents: Elf Level Respect
20 - 30 presents: Hey, no professionals. Oh, you're not? You should be.
30 - 40 presents : Next in Line on the Santa Throne
50+: You are Santa
